name: Flappy Bird Clone (squidee_)
description:
My really lazy attempt at a flappy bird clone. It's filled with spaghetti code and cheap workarounds. Should work like the actual flappy bird aside from the fact the speed is framerate-dependent.

Controls: Jump (Space/Left Click)

Assets: https://www.spriters-resource.com/mobile/flappybird/sheet/59894/
